title: slot canyon adventure
summary: We went on an adventure in some slot canyons this week!
content: This week my family and I went on an adventure in some slot canyons to hopfully find some quiet waters. We ended finding a ton of cliff jumping spots and some perfect wakesurfing spots!

title: tubing
content: Breakout the Advil and Tylonol because we went tubing today. Safe to say getting thrashed around on the tube is the most fun I've had in a while! Might've lost the tube but we still have a piece of it!

title: wake surfing
content: Wakesurfing is probably one of the most family friendly things you could do on a boat! Everyone loves to do it in our friend group and it really does make the time fly!
